title: On the Question of Degeneracy of Topological Solitons in a Gauged O(3) Non-Linear Sigma Model with Chern-Simons Term
abstract: We show that the degeneracy of topological solitons in the gauged O(3) non-linear sigma model with Chern-Simons term may be removed by chosing a self-interaction potential with symmetry - breaking minima. The topological solitons in the model has energy,charge,flux and angular momentum quantised in each topological sector.
